title: Looking For Ranked Teams Gold and Bronze.
body: Looking For 2 Ranked Teams 1 for Bronze Acc and 1 for gold, ADC/Supp/Top Player. Add Hades Reloaded for info.

replies.body: Hi. i main supp am bronz 4 atm and will be climbing during the season, have played with a silver - diamond team before and didnt let them down. let me know if you are still looking for people.
currently bronze due to ask players. was silver last season :) wanting to join a ranked team
